title.rendered: How Much Do You Get Paid To Junk A Car?

content.rendered:
Salvage or junk cars in Chicago and the surrounding areas are priced based on several specific factors. The condition of the salvageable components of the car is considered in the price, as is the age, model, and make of the vehicle. Typically, popular vehicles on the road have a higher salvage price based on the mileage on the vehicle, while very old vehicles with high mileage tend to be on the lower side of the pricing. Ideally, contacting Aero Auto Parts is the best option to get an accurate price for your vehicle.

Weighing the Cost of Repair

When considering the price that can be obtained for junk cars in Chicago, a central factor to weigh is the cost of the repair. In most cases, cars that are sold for salvage have significant bodywork or mechanical issues that make the option to repair the vehicle not a feasible option.

Getting quotes from garages and mechanics, checking out the cost of OEM new parts, discovering your aftermarket options, or figuring out the costs of salvaged parts is also important in making the decision. If you are going to do the repair yourself, keep in mind any car rentals you may need while completing the repair.

Let Aero Auto Parts Help

Our team of experienced representatives can provide you with a quote for your junk cars in Chicago. We come and look at your car, make an offer based on the condition of the vehicle, and manage all towing at no cost to you. If you are interested in getting a free estimate, give us a call at 773-645-9586.
